item.description:
The results of our recent "A - F" restaurant poll were conclusive, to say the least: One particular restaurant outscored all the other candidates by a minimum of 7 votes!

So... It's local! It's Italian! It's upscale! It's Caffe Tosca in Hingham! And it's our destination for dinner on the last Thursday of this month.

Please join us in Hingham Square on Thursday, February 23rd as we head across the street from local institution Tosca to sample an experience a bit less formal but no less flavorful.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Caffe Tosca 
Thursday, February 23rd, 2012 @ 6:30 PM 
15 North St. 
Hingham, MA
(781) 740-9400 
Website: Caffe Tosca

Organizer: Mike

Guests: Yes. Two per member allowed. For questions about exceptions, please contact Mike.

Min/Max: Minimum of Six by Tuesday, February 21.

Price Range: A selection of pizzas runs from $13.00 - $15.00. Pastas can be ordered as "small plates", mostly for $11.00 - $12.00, or as entree-sized portions for $18.00 more. Other entrees range from $18.00 (eggplant parmigiana) to $29.00 (filet mignon or seared tuna steak)

Event Fee: Current Annual Members - None, Group Members - $2.00, Guests - $2.00; $12 to become a 2012 Annual Member (Definitely worth it, especially if you plan to attend at least 5 more events this year.)

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over five years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

RSVP Deadline: Wednesday, February 22nd @ 6:00 pm. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by the Event Organizer. Changes to "No" after the deadline will be considered No-Shows per our guidelines on the About Us Pages.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: Caffe Tosca is located in Hingham Square, across from its larger sister restaurant Tosca, quite close to the rotary on Route 3A.
item.how_to_find_us: Our reservation is under both 'Mike' and 'South Shore Meetup Group'.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Caffe Tosca
